# How to use orient

## create your app

```ts
import { Mobile } from '@site/ui/Mobile'
import { useOrient } from 'reev/react'
//                or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { alpha, beta, gamma } = useOrient()
        return <Mobile alpha={alpha} beta={beta} gamma={gamma} />
}
```

import { Mobile } from '@site/ui/Mobile'
import { useOrient } from 'reev/react'
//                or from '@reev/external/react'

export const App = () => {
        const { offset } = useOrient()
        const [alpha, beta, gamma] = offset
        return <Mobile alpha={alpha} beta={beta} gamma={gamma} />
}

<App />
